ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Charming/CoM
ygData.msgSnippet: Wish Rathe Mtns weren t always so crowded on Bertox as it would be easy for 1 bard to own the entire area. However, during the late night/early morning times
ygData.messageBody:
Wish Rathe Mtns weren't always so crowded on Bertox as it would be easy for
1 bard to own the entire area. However, during the late night/early morning
times it'd be easy to be king here. It's one of the reasons I headed to
Kunark, to get away from the crowds.

Windleaf Mistsong
Clan Battlehammer
Bertoxxulous


At 03:13 PM 10/5/00 -0400, you wrote:
>in a group i'll sing celerity, chant of battle and manasong or regen. But i
>will not only sing mana, any group that starts tellin me what to sing and
>only sing can kiss my blue butt
>
>But i'm probably gonna end up stayin in rathe mountains for a few levels so
>means i'll make some nice cash while im there. I'm allready up almost 1000pp
>in gems, and i dont think i'll be leaving there till i have at least 2
>stacks of 20 rubies, who knows i might stay till im 46 and with a full
>backpack *shrug*
>
>Minkin Nehoc
>Dark Ones
>Sol Ro
